info.title: Azure Site Recovery Management Service API
info.description: A first party Azure service enabling the data replication.

AadOauth2Auth.description: The Azure Active Directory OAuth2 Flow

get.description: List the operations for the provider

post.summary: Performs the resource name availability check.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription. The value must be an UUID.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The name of the Azure region.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

get.description: Gets the list of fabrics in the given subscription.
Gets the list of vaults in the given subscription.

parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription. The value must be an UUID.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

get.description: Gets the list of fabrics in the given subscription and resource group.

get.description: Gets the list of recovery points of the given protected item.

targetVmName.description: Gets or sets the target VM display name.

hyperVGeneration.description: Gets or sets the hypervisor generation of the virtual machine possible values are 1,2.

targetNetworkId.description: Gets or sets the target network Id within AzStackHCI Cluster.

testNetworkId.description: Gets or sets the target test network Id within AzStackHCI Cluster.

targetCpuCores.description: Gets or sets the target CPU cores.

isDynamicRam.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether memory is dynamical.

targetMemoryInMegaBytes.description: Gets or sets the target memory in mega-bytes.

osType.description: Gets or sets the type of the OS.

osName.description: Gets or sets the name of the OS.

firmwareType.description: Gets or sets the firmware type.

fabricDiscoveryMachineId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the discovered machine.

sourceVmName.description: Gets or sets the source VM display name.

sourceCpuCores.description: Gets or sets the source VM CPU cores.

sourceMemoryInMegaBytes.description: Gets or sets the source VM ram memory size in megabytes.

runAsAccountId.description: Gets or sets the run as account Id.

targetDraName.description: Gets or sets the target DRA name.

targetApplianceName.description: Gets or sets the target appliance name.

failoverRecoveryPointId.description: Gets or sets the recovery point Id to which the VM was failed over.

lastRecoveryPointReceived.description: Gets or sets the last recovery point received time.

lastRecoveryPointId.description: Gets or sets the last recovery point Id.

initialReplicationProgressPercentage.description:
Gets or sets the initial replication progress percentage. This is calculated based on
total bytes processed for all disks in the source VM.

migrationProgressPercentage.description: Gets or sets the migration progress percentage.

resumeProgressPercentage.description: Gets or sets the resume progress percentage.

resyncProgressPercentage.description:
Gets or sets the resync progress percentage. This is calculated based on total bytes
processed for all disks in the source VM.

resyncRetryCount.description: Gets or sets the resync retry count.

resyncRequired.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether resync is required.

resyncState.description: Gets or sets the resync state.

performAutoResync.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether auto resync is to be done.

resumeRetryCount.description: Gets or sets the resume retry count.

lastReplicationUpdateTime.description: Gets or sets the latest timestamp that replication status is updated.

nicId.description: Gets or sets the NIC Id.

macAddress.description: Gets or sets the NIC mac address.

label.description: Gets or sets the NIC label.

isPrimaryNic.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is the primary NIC.

networkName.description: Gets or sets the network name.

targetNetworkId.description: Gets or sets the target network Id within AzStackHCI Cluster.

testNetworkId.description: Gets or sets the target test network Id within AzStackHCI Cluster.

selectionTypeForFailover.description: Gets or sets the selection type of the NIC.

VMwareToAzStackHCIReplicationExtensionMo.description: VMware to AzStackHCI Replication extension model custom properties.

azStackHciSiteId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the AzStackHCI site.

gatewayServiceUri.description: Gets or sets the Uri of Gateway.

targetGatewayServiceId.description: Gets or sets the gateway service Id of target.

sourceStorageContainerName.description: Gets or sets the source storage container name.

targetStorageContainerName.description: Gets or sets the target storage container name.

resourceLocation.description: Gets or sets the resource location.
